title: Worldwide COVID-19 death toll tops a staggering 3 million
content:
1. Worldwide COVID-19 death toll tops a staggering 3 million  Associated Press
  2. Global Covid-19 death toll passes three million mark  South China Morning Post
  3. Covid death toll nears 3 million as India cases surge  Bangkok Post
  4. Coronavirus vaccine Update | Covaxin Production To Be Doubled By May-June 2021 | Breaking News  India Today
  5. Covid-19 Global Death Toll Nears 3 Million  The New York Times

localize.title: COVID-19による全世界の死者数が300万人を突破
全球COVID-19死亡人数突破300万的惊人数字。
